scripts.migrate: export MIGRATIONS_DEEPLINKS_APP_URL=localhost:3007; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SSL=0; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey; (cd node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks; npm run unmigrate; npm run migrate;)
scripts.heroku-postbuild: export PORT=3007 NEXT_PUBLIC_HASURA_PATH='/hasura' NEXT_PUBLIC_DEEP_FOUNDATION_HASURA_RELATIVE=1; ( cd deepcase && npm ci; npm run build)
